attributes.action: Raise taxes for those earning more than 100k and 1 million per annum
attributes.additional_details: The government is spending a lot supporting the economy, NHS and vaccines. Rather than raising taxes on everyone and increasing VAT. Please raise taxes for those earning over £100K and £1 million per annum
attributes.background: The government is spending a lot supporting the economy, NHS and vaccines. Rather than raising taxes on everyone and increasing VAT. Please raise taxes for those earning over £100K and £1 million per annum

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568669
